commit message: Renamed package 'reader_native' to 'reader'
Removed 'reader_' prefix from margin & text size dimens
Removed 'reader_' prefix from avatar size dimens
Renamed ReaderAniUtils.java to AniUtils.java
Renamed ReaderLog.java to AppLog.java
Renamed NativeReaderActivity to ReaderActivity
update mixpanel track exception methods

Merge pull request #629 from wordpress-mobile/issue/596-rename-reader-items

Issue/596 rename reader items
fix #385: only send PN settings when notifications changed and settings screen is closed
Images are no longer faded in when isImmediate=true and isInLayoutPass=true

Merge pull request #598 from wordpress-mobile/issue/334-notifications-crash-with-certain-html

Fix #334 notifications crash with certain html

Reviewed last commit with @aerych.
Default/error images now use ColorDrawable, and no longer fading in downloaded avatars (only photos/videos are faded in)
Simplified the default drawable, which corrects the problem where the default drawable doesn't fill the full imageView
Featured image is now retained after updating post in detail view
Adds support for storing the VideoPress shortcode from the WordPress.com XML-RPC API. If a VP shortcode is present while uploading a video, it will be used instead of a video HTML tag.
Corrected a remoteBlogId reference to use localTableBlogId.
Bumping db version, so devs and beta testers wonâ€™t get a crash when updating.

WPImageGetter fixes:
* Use Photon when a max size is passed
* Use a WeakReference for the TextView in case activity is closed before image is downloaded
* Use the context of the passed TextView when one is needed to avoid holding onto the context
* Fix bug that caused images to sometimes not appear
